channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Looming Infrastructure Issues That Could Doom ChatGPT’s Atlas
item.description: ChatGPT's browser looks great — but bad legacy data and connectivity issues could doom it and others before they even reach the mass market.

item.title: AI And Video Will Fuel 1.1 Billion Creators By 2032, Report Forecasts
item.description: AI and video are reshaping media as creators become studios and brands act like creators, driving the creator economy to 1.1 billion people by 2032.

item.title: OpenAI’s Secret Financial Project
item.description: Plus: Lonely seniors are turning to AI.

item.title: ‘Fear The Walking Dead’ Star Cast As The Cowardly Lion In ‘Wicked’ Sequel
item.description: Colman Domingo will play the Cowardly Lion in 'Wicked: For Good' which releases in theaters this November.

item.title: Has ChatGPT Atlas Just Turned The Internet Into A Classroom?
item.description: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Atlas browser brings AI into everyday browsing. Could this help students and educators ask, explore, and understand in real time?

item.title: The writer’s room

item.title: Foggy mirror
item.description: It’s easy to believe we have an accurate understanding of ourselves. After all, we spend a lot of time looking in the mirror. It might be worth wonder...

item.title: It’s not a silly thing to do
item.description: So many options, so little time. A friend asked if he should put his podcast on YouTube. After all, that’s how many people are consuming this sort of ...

item.title: Attention is a luxury good
item.description: Luxury goods are special: they are scarce and expensive, and they earn us status with some folks because it shows that we paid more than we needed to....

item.title: Fermi’s Law
item.description: Enrico Fermi found a paradox: If there’s intelligent life on other planets, why haven’t we heard from them yet? Perhaps the answer is this: Any civili...
